cdn 다운안될 경우를 대비

  • 2020-05-12

https://heeestorys.tistory.com/737

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>Title</title>
</head>
<body>


<script>
    window.jQuery || document.write('<script defer src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.5.0.min.js"></\script>')
    window.jQuery || document.write('<script defer src="https://unpkg.com/swiper/js/swiper.min.js"></\script>')
    window.jQuery || document.write('<script defer src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/bodymovin/5.6.10/lottie.min.js"></\script>')

    window.onload = function () {
        var swiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
            pagination: {
                el: '.swiper-pagination',
            },
        });
        var animation = bodymovin.loadAnimation({
            container: document.getElementById('lottie1'),
            animType: 'svg',
            loop: true,
            autoplay: true,
            path: '../json/lottie_intro_01.json'
        });
        var animation = bodymovin.loadAnimation({
            container: document.getElementById('lottie2'),
            animType: 'svg',
            loop: true,
            autoplay: true,
            path: '../json/lottie_intro_02.json'
        });
        var animation = bodymovin.loadAnimation({
            container: document.getElementById('lottie3'),
            animType: 'svg',
            loop: true,
            autoplay: true,
            path: '../json/lottie_intro_03.json'
        });
        var animation = bodymovin.loadAnimation({
            container: document.getElementById('lottie4'),
            animType: 'svg',
            loop: true,
            autoplay: true,
            path: '../json/lottie_intro_04.json'
        });
        var animation = bodymovin.loadAnimation({
            container: document.getElementById('lottie5'),
            animType: 'svg',
            loop: true,
            autoplay: true,
            path: '../json/lottie_intro_05.json'
        });
        var animation = bodymovin.loadAnimation({
            container: document.getElementById('lottie6'),
            animType: 'svg',
            loop: true,
            autoplay: true,
            path: '../json/lottie_intro_06.json'
        });
        var animation = bodymovin.loadAnimation({
            container: document.getElementById('lottie7'),
            animType: 'svg',
            loop: true,
            autoplay: true,
            path: '../json/lottie_intro_07.json'
        });
    }

</script>
</body>
</html>

window.onload 펑션을 사용하니 된다~~!?!!??
